title: Australian Vice Chief of Defence Forces called on COAS
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 10 (APP):Australian Vice Chief of Defence Forces Vice Admiral David Johnston, the Officer of the Order of Australia (AO) Royal Australian Navy (RAN) Friday called on Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa at General Headquarters (GHQ).
During the meeting, matters of mutual interest and regional security were discussed, said a press release.
The COAS reiterated the offer he made to General Angus John Campbell, Chief of Defence Force for any assistance in tackling the bush fires in Australia.
Visiting dignitary appreciated role of Pakistan Army in ensuring peace and stability
in the region and thanked the COAS for sentiments towards Australia.
